enroll_customer.acceptspecialoffer: Yes, Grand Rapids Energy may send me information about special offers from Grand Rapids Energy and its marketing partners.

enroll_customer.confirmationcontent:
[

We are currently processing your transfer of service request. A confirmation email will be sent shortly to flanders@ned.com. If there are any issues\, we will contact you to remedy them.

Once your order is completed\, you will receive your written agreement including your Terms and Conditions of Service in the mail. In addition\, your local distribution company will send you a letter confirming your Grand Rapids Energy enrollment.

Thank you for choosing Grand Rapids Energy to be your natural gas supplier.

]
enroll_customer.deltaconfirmationcontent: You have selected to provide us with your Delta Skymiles account number later. When you find your account number please go to grandrapidsenergy.com/skymiles.html to enter your number to get your bonus miles.
enroll_customer.donthaveskymilesnum: Don’t have your skymiles Number at the Moment?
enroll_customer.donthaveskymilesnumdesc: If you do not have your Delta Skymiles Number with you, you may enter it later. You have until xx/xx/xxxx to get us your Skymiles number. Instructions on how they can give it to you later should display here
enroll_customer.header: You are eligible for a Bonus Offer
enroll_customer.headercontent:
Welcome to Grand Rapids Energy!

If you are an existing Grand Rapids Energy customer, please check the account number you entered below. If it is incorrect, please go back and re-enter.
enroll_customer.headerdesc: Switch to Grand Rapids Energy(GRE) and start earning with Delta SkyMiles®.Grand Rapids Energy is excited to be a Delta SkyMiles partner and the only Gas Supplier in Michigan with whom you can earn miles just for paying your natural gas bill.
enroll_customer.howitworks:
How It Works

  • Customers will now earn TWO miles for every dollar spent on their GRE supplier natural gas charges (excluding sales tax and one-time charges)!
  • And, if you are a Delta SkyMiles® Medallion® member, Delta will award an additional mile for each dollar spent as described above!
  • It’s easy to start participating. Simply enter your GRE account and SkyMiles member information below. If you’d prefer to enroll by phone, call GRE (toll-free) at 1-888-466-4427 and mention that you would like to enroll in GRE's Delta SkyMiles partnership program. Please have your SkyMiles account number handy when you call.

Frequently Asked Questions >

Program Terms & Conditions >

Join Delta Skymiles >

enroll_customer.rafcontent: If a friend referred you to ONG and shared a 5-6 digit referral code, please enter it here.
enroll_customer.rafofferheading: Want to earn $50 Visa Reward Cards?
enroll_customer.rafoffersubheading:
You just enrolled on our lowest available 12-Month Fixed plan, congratulations.

You can share this rate with your friends through our Refer-a-Friendprogram, and for each friend who signs up with us, you’ll both receive a  $50 Visa Reward Card.

Hurry, the rate you received will only email available through June 30, 2017
